name: Wizard Wobble
description:
Make it to the window at the top to get the wizard back into his tower!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump/Double Jump

Q - Toggle Between Obstacle & Platform

Mouse Left-Click - Place Obstacle or Platform

P - Pause Game

Objective: Make it to the platform at the top of the tower and click the OK button. Use mana (blue bar) to place platforms (bottom-left box) to climb, and place obstacles (bottom-right box) to gain more mana to place more platforms. The game will get harder each time you win. Try to get to 5 wins!

Devs:

Nathaniel Chu

Isai Rincon

AJ Rivas
